first_para: Julian Leon Huppert (born 21 July 1978) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom and Member of Parliament for Cambridge since 2010.

full.extract:
Julian Leon Huppert (born 21 July 1978) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom and Member of Parliament for Cambridge since 2010.
He succeeded the previously elected David Howarth, who stood down after one term.
^ London Gazette (2010-05-13): List of members returned to serve in Parliament at the general election 2010
^ "Election candidates to clash at public debate". Cambridge News. 9 February 2010. Retrieved 2010-04-15. 
^ "Lib Dems pick new city candidate". BBC News. 17 January 2010.
full.title: Julian Huppert
